Package edu.odu.cs.cs350

Class HTMLDocumentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.odu.cs.cs350.HTMLDocumentBuilder
  • public class HTMLDocumentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes in different HTML tags and attributes and extracts all tags of the given type. Currently, I am focusing on extracting images only. Other tags will be supported as the implementation expands.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HTMLDocumentBuilder()
      Default constructor for HTMLBuilder, initializes all data members.

      • determineLocality

        public Locality determineLocality​(java.lang.String extractedURI,
                                  java.lang.String baseSiteDirectory,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> baseSiteURLs,
                                  java.lang.String pathOfSourceDoc,
                                  java.lang.String urlOfSourceDoc)
        This function determines locality with the help of three other functions.
        Parameters:
        extractedURI - the URI that was extracted from a file during analysis.
        baseSiteDirectory - the base site directory that the user supplied the program.
        baseSiteURLs - the base website URLs that the user supplied to the program.
        pathOfSourceDoc - the path of the document which the URI was extracted.
        urlOfSourceDoc - the URL of the document from which the URI was extracted.
        Returns:
        the locality of the URI.

      • convertURLToPath

        public java.lang.String convertURLToPath​(java.lang.String uriAsString,
                                         java.util.List<java.net.URL> baseUrls)
        Converts the URL to a path.
        Parameters:
        uriAsString - URI converted to a string.
        baseUrls - URL that was passed in to HTMLDocumentBuilder.

      • determineLocalityOfPath

        public Locality determineLocalityOfPath​(java.lang.String rawPath,
                                        java.lang.String baseSiteDirectory,
                                        java.lang.String pathOfSourceDoc)
        This function determines and returns the locality of a path that is passed in.
        Parameters:
        rawPath - path as a string that is being examined.
        baseSiteDirectory - base site directory of path.
        pathOfSourceDoc - path of the source document on disk.

      • determineLocalityOfURL

        public Locality determineLocalityOfURL​(java.lang.String rawURL,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> baseSiteURLs,
                                       java.lang.String urlOfSourceDoc)
        This function determines and returns the locality of a URL that is passed in.
        Parameters:
        rawURL - URL as a string that is being passed in.
        baseSiteURLs - list of base sites of the URL.
        urlOfSourceDoc - URL of the source document on disk.
